LanguageData.RWBY_Coco_Handbag.label: Coco's Handbag
LanguageData.RWBY_Coco_Handbag.description: Coco's Handbag is Coco Adel's weapon of choice. Because of the weight that is concealed in the handbag, it can be used as a powerful bludgeoning weapon.
LanguageData.RWBY_Coco_Handbag.tools.0.label: handle
